com.almasb.fxgl.physics

Class PhysicsEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.entity.Entity
      • com.almasb.fxgl.physics.PhysicsEntity

  • public final class PhysicsEntity
extends Entity
    An entity being managed by PhysicsManager and hence is being affected by physics space and its forces

    Entity.translate(Point2D) and Entity.setX(double) methods will NOT work. Use setLinearVelocity(Point2D) to move the object.

    BodyType.KINEMATIC will retain its velocity at all times unless manually changed BodyType.DYNAMIC will lose its velocity over time based on external forces BodyType.STATIC doesn't move even if you set its velocity to non-zero

    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • setLinearVelocity

        public void setLinearVelocity(javafx.geometry.Point2D vector)
        Set linear velocity for a physics entity

        Use this method to move a physics entity Please note that the vector x and y are in pixels

        Parameters:
        vector - x and y in pixels
